column3: ACK facbdc0f5e04701905834f1b5d37e0ed41d2c2dd - credit where credit is due :)

Thanks, I had written this down somewhere but forgot about it.\nIt's unfortunate that `git log --use-mailmap --format='%aN%n%cN'` (as used to generate the list of authors) doesn't take into account `Co-Authored-By`.
